display_long_description:
Construct an epic base and battle for peace in Crystal Commanders, a brand new RTS game in both mixed and virtual reality!

# Cliffside Clash is Live

Our first major patch, Cliffside Clash, is live!

**New Map: Cliffside Arena**
[media]

**Matchmaking**
[media]

**New Mode: Payload Pursuit**
[media]

And more!
- Creative Mode Updates
- VS AI Hard Mode
- Light Walls
- New Music

# Mixed reality RTS action

Take charge of your forces, expand your defenses, and engage enemies in rapid skirmishes using unique, expressive controls. Deploy a diverse array of vehicles, towers, and contraptions to thwart a planetary threat, all from the universe of your living room!

[media]

**Battle anytime, anywhere:**

Not in a good spot for MR? No worries - just jump into one of the included VR levels and play any mode wherever you want! Supports Meta Quest 2, 3 and 3S!

[media]

**Action-packed story campaign:**

Join Castor and the other members of the Crystal Vanguard as they push back the crafty Crimson Blade in an epic, fully voiced campaign that dynamically adapts to your room!

[media]

**Challenge a friend to the ultimate RTS battle:**

Put your base building skills to the ultimate test in 1v1 multiplayer, battling with friends locally in MR or remotely in VR! Modes include RTS staples, such as destroy the HQ, as well as new takes on classics like kill the king, all with VS AI support to practice against.

[media]

# Mixed reality RTS action

Take charge of your forces, expand your defenses, and engage enemies in rapid skirmishes using unique, expressive controls. Deploy a diverse array of vehicles, towers, and contraptions to thwart a planetary threat, all from the universe of your living room!

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001727_432216016651355_1077834318409314703_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=sxXUs2CWJHAQ7kNvwGM8lKn&_nc_oc=AdmIqpbCLQOTui9x-8RHGBTbc112GiB0gDGLsbfQI4iGxZV7FEI88k3Bd24suRQexkI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cCTa9GTScg_sIm5fZvkwkw&oh=00_AfMhe6ePu1N-_focJbP71ZNtEmhzvsNYrqBGJ4nnLuaFjw&oe=684D2BD9)

**Battle anytime, anywhere:**

Not in a good spot for MR? No worries - just jump into one of the included VR levels and play any mode wherever you want! Supports Meta Quest 2, 3 and 3S!

**Action-packed story campaign:**

Join Castor and the other members of the Crystal Vanguard as they push back the crafty Crimson Blade in an epic, fully voiced campaign that dynamically adapts to your room!

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39001728_316617268181767_7988946962016774868_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ocL51XaXqY4Q7kNvwG7GaYu&_nc_oc=AdnCcg8y6dwqauUBIHN2qgPUlq3SFmC_SEAGSxjb22uZP2xVHgvHgLo5bCK1EpN_LDQ&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfPvw2ubf23IWZKHayRe2euok0VFbV9kE6Vxv5j4r_3RZQ&oe=684CFBBB)

**Challenge a friend to the ultimate RTS battle:**

Put your base building skills to the ultimate test in 1v1 multiplayer, battling with friends locally in MR or remotely in VR! Modes include RTS staples, such as destroy the HQ, as well as new takes on classics like kill the king, all with VS AI support to practice against.
